{Flotsam}

You search through the flotsam and find some wood and some gold.
core.advevent.54:
{Flotsam}

You search through the flotsam and find some wood and some gold.
core.advevent.55:
{Fountain of Fortune}

As you drink the bittersweet water, you feel your luck changing.
core.advevent.56:
{Fountain of Fortune}

You drink from the enchanted fountain, but nothing happens.
core.advevent.57:
{Fountain of Youth}

You drink from the fountain's waters and feel young again!  Sensing your renewed vigor, your army's morale improves, allowing you to cover additional ground as you head for your next battle.
core.advevent.58:
{Fountain of Youth}

You drink from the enchanted fountain, but nothing happens.
core.advevent.59:
{Garden of Revelation}

A monk sitting in the center of a garden invites you to meditate with him.  You do, and after a short time you feel enlightened.
core.advevent.6:
{Eser}

Bir Leprechaun sana 2500 altincik ve 3 %s karsiliginda %s'yi oneriyor.  Bu eseri almak istiyor musun?
core.advevent.60:
{Garden of Revelation}

You enter the garden, and the monk, recognizing you, says, "My child, the blessing of knowledge comes but once in a person's lifetime."
core.advevent.61: You enter a rickety hut and talk to the magician who lives there.  He tells you of places near and far which may aid you in your journeys.
core.advevent.62:
{Idol of Fortune}

You've found an ancient and weathered stone idol.  Kissing it is supposed to bring luck or happiness, so you do.  The stone is very cold to the touch.
core.advevent.63:
{Idol of Fortune}

You've found an ancient and weathered stone idol.  It is supposed to grant luck or happiness to visitors, but since the stars are already shining upon you, it does nothing.
core.advevent.64:
{Lean To}

You've found an abandoned lean-to.  Poking about, you discover some resources hidden nearby.
core.advevent.65:
{Lean To}

This lean-to is long abandoned.  There is nothing of value here.
core.advevent.66:
{Library of Enlightenment}

The caretaker admits you into the Library of Enlightenment.  You are able to learn much in the short time you spend here.
core.advevent.67:
{Library of Enlightenment}

Recognizing you, the caretaker refuses to admit you.  "The Library of Enlightenment," he says, "may be visited but once."
core.advevent.68:
{Library of Enlightenment}

The caretaker opens the door and looks you up and down.  "You are neither famous nor diplomatic enough to be admitted to the Library of Enlightenment," he sniffs.  "Come back when you think yourself worthy."
core.advevent.69:
{Lighthouse}

This lighthouse is now under your control, and all of your ships will now move further each turn.
core.advevent.7:
{Eser}

Bir Leprechaun sana 3000 altincik ve 5 %s karsiliginda %s'yi oneriyor.  Bu eseri almak istiyor musun?
core.advevent.70: This structure is obviously a travel gate, but it no longer appears to be functioning.
core.advevent.71:
{School of Magic}

The tingle of magic fills the air of this school of mystical arts.  An acolyte offers to sign you up for the next class for 1000 gold.  You will have your choice of increasing your knowledge, or learning to better focus your powers.
core.advevent.72:
{School of Magic}

An old wizard appears out of thin air.  "Master," he says, "you have learned all that we could possibly teach you."
core.advevent.73:
{School of Magic}

The tingle of magic fills the air of this school of mystical arts.  An acolyte informs you that he could sign you up for the next class, but that you do not have the required tuition of 1000 gold.
core.advevent.74:
{Magic Spring}

A drink from the spring fills your blood with magic!  You have twice your normal spell points in reserve.
core.advevent.75:
{Magic Spring}

The magic spring only regenerates once a week, and someone has already been here this week.
core.advevent.76:
{Magic Spring}

A drink at the spring is supposed to give you twice your normal spell points, but you are already at that level.
core.advevent.77:
{Magic Well}

A drink from the well has restored your spell points to maximum.
core.advevent.78:
{Magic Well}

A second drink at the well in one day will not help you.
core.advevent.79:
{Magic Well}

A drink at the well is supposed to restore your spell points, but you are already at maximum.
core.advevent.80:
{Mercenary Camp}

You've come upon a camp of mercenaries practicing their combat tactics.  They welcome you and your troops and invite you to train with them.
core.advevent.81:
{Mercenary Camp}

You've come upon a camp of mercenaries practicing their combat tactics.  "You're too advanced for us," the mercenary captain says.  "We can teach you nothing more."
core.advevent.82:
{Mermaid}

The mermaids silently entice you to return later and be blessed again.
core.advevent.83:
{Mermaid}

The magical, soothing beauty of the Mermaids reaches you and your crew.  Briefly you forget your worries and bask in the beauty of the moment.  The mermaids' charms bless you with increased luck for your next combat.
core.advevent.84: You come upon an abandoned mine.  The mine appears to be infested with Troglodytes.  Do you wish to enter?
core.advevent.85: You beat the Troglodytes and are able to restore the mine to production.
core.advevent.86:
{Takipciler}
Bir grup %s daha buyuk bir zafer ihtirasiyla sana katilmak istiyorlar. Kabul ediyor musun?
core.advevent.87: Onlarin onerisini reddetmenin hakaretiyle, yaratiklar saldiriyorlar!
core.advevent.88: %s birligi senin diplomatik konusmandan etkilendi, ve %d altin karsiliginda orduna katilmak istiyorlar.  Kabul ediyor musun?
core.advevent.89: Yaratiklar senin diplomatik konusmandan etkileniyor ve sana bir oneride bulunuyorlar:
core.advevent.9:
{Eser}

Bir esere denk geldin.  Tam alacakken bir Cerberi surusu sana saldirmak icin beliriyor, eserlerini kuzu kuzu vermeye niyetli degiller.
core.advevent.90: %d tane %s %d altin karsiliginda orduna katilmak istiyor.  Kabul ediyor musun?
core.advevent.91: The %s, awed by the power of your forces, begin to scatter.  Do you wish to pursue and engage them?
core.advevent.92:
{Mystical Garden}

The sound of music brings you to a small garden, where you are able to sneak up on a leprechaun who is happily dancing about in the clearing.  You capture him, and in exchange for his freedom he guides you to a small pot filled with precious things.
core.advevent.93:
{Mystical Garden}

The sound of music brings you to a small garden, where you attempt to sneak up on a leprechaun who is happily dancing about in the clearing.  You try to capture him, but his nimbleness allows him to elude you.
core.advevent.94:
{Oasis}

The drink at the oasis is refreshing, but offers no further benefit.  The oasis might help again if you fought a battle first.
core.advevent.95:
{Oasis}

A drink at the oasis fills your troops with strength and lifts their spirits.  You can travel a bit further today.
core.advevent.96:
{Obelisk}

You come upon an obelisk made from a type of stone you have never seen before.  Staring at it intently, the smooth surface suddenly changes to an inscription.  The inscription is a piece of a lost ancient map.  Quickly, you copy down the piece, and the inscription vanishes as abruptly as it had appeared.
core.advevent.98:
{Redwood Observatory}

From the top of the observatory, you are able to see distant lands.
core.advevent.99:
{Pillar of Fire}

You discover a tall gaslight tower.  You light it, which produces enough light to penetrate the subterranean darkness.

core.genrltxt.106:
The Heroes III: %s CD-ROM bulunamadi!

%s'in cdsini tak ya da en kotu ihtimalle crack yap, Campaign Games, and hosting Multi-player Games.  

If you wish to join a Multi-player Game hosted by another player, a CD is not required, and you may proceed.

If you wish to play a Single Scenario or a Campaign, please quit and insert the %s CD, before re-running %s.

core.genrltxt.242:
{Kaynaklar}

There are seven resources in Heroes III, used to build and improve castles, purchase troops and recruit heroes.  Gold is the most common, required for virtually everything.  Wood and ore are used for most buildings.  Gems, Mercury, Sulfur and Crystal are rare magical resources used for the most powerful creatures and buildings.

/S0 - disable sound and music

HEROES3 /S0 /I0

Starts Heroes III with no sound and no intro.

core.genrltxt.708:
{Insufficient Disk Space}

Heroes III requires at least 1 MB of free space on the current drive to save a game.

To delete a previously saved game select it and press CTRL-DELETE.

To make room manually press ALT-TAB to return to Windows.

core.help.257.help:
{Oyuncu El Suresi}

Using the slider, you may set 'soft' player turn durations.  By 'soft', a timer counts down a player's turn when not in combat.  When in combat, the timer is paused.

Turn durations are 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 minutes.
'Unlimited' is the default setting.
core.help.26.help:

Oyuncu ve bilgisayar esit kaynaklarla baslar, ve bilgisayar elinden gelen en iyi sekilde oynar.

This option allows the computer to handle all combat calculations, and the player will only be shown the Combat Results screen.

core.help.365.help:
{High Quality Video}

Faster machines can handle more data, and this this option allows those machines to view the videos at their highest quality.

core.overview.9: {Digerleri}Kusanilmasina gerek olmadan etkisini gosteren eserleri gosterir.
core.randtvrn.0: I've heard that the dazzling scales of the Diamond Dragon are bright enough to blind an unwary foe.
core.randtvrn.1: From the deepest pits of Hell comes the Antichrist and he will take your soul.
core.randtvrn.10: The terrifying Gorynych resembles a Hydra but has the wings of a dragon!
core.randtvrn.100: Drinking the waters of Hydromel from a Fountain of Fortune will temporarily boost a hero's attack and defense skills in combat.
core.randtvrn.101: Breathing the spores of giant mushrooms of air, fire, earth and water will temporarily give a hero great power over the magic spells of those elements.
core.randtvrn.102: Sometimes you'll find the deed to a fully-functional mine locked away in a chest. They're completely legal.
core.randtvrn.103: Asmodeus is attuned to Hero's who carry the Hourglass of the Evil Hour and will fight for any who call him. But a piece of the Hero's soul is the price.
core.randtvrn.104: Rumor has it that heroes and town-types are now closer in ability than ever before.
core.randtvrn.105: Sometimes a wizard will lose her spellbook and the lucky finder will gain its power instead.
core.randtvrn.106: The strange inhabitants of the Grotto keep a stash of ore and gold.
core.randtvrn.107: Destroy some lowly vampires at the Transylvanian Tavern and you may impress the Vampire Lords enough to join your cause.
core.randtvrn.108: Yarasa Evi Vampirler icin bir cennettir.
core.randtvrn.109: The woodland protectors of the Hunting Lodge stockpile wood and gold.
core.randtvrn.11: En iyi saldiri bir lejyon Azure Dragondur!
core.randtvrn.110: Dispose of the guardian Golems and Gremlins of the Snow-covered Grotto and claim your reward.
core.randtvrn.111: A Hero can leave his troops just about anywhere on guard duty but if they feel abandoned, they'll never rejoin his army.
core.randtvrn.112: Master Attack ve Master Defense ozelligi olan bir komutan rakibinin savunmasini 50% azaltabilir.
core.randtvrn.113: Master Attack ve Master Hit Points ozelligi olan bir komutan rakiplerini korkudan dondurabilir.
core.randtvrn.114: Master Attack ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan her zaman max hasar verir.
core.randtvrn.115: Master Attack ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutana karsilik verilemez.
core.randtvrn.116: Master Attack ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan uzaktan saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.117: Master Defense ve Master Hit Points ozelligi olan bir komutan can retaliate against unlimited foes.
core.randtvrn.118: Master Defense ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan cevresindeki butun dusmanlara birden saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.119: Master Defense ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan rakiplerini felc edebilir.
core.randtvrn.12: Did you ever hear the one about the bunny who dreamed of being a carrot... and then became one?
core.randtvrn.120: Master Defense ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan ara sira fiziksel saldirilari bloke edebilir.
core.randtvrn.121: Master Hit Points ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan her tur iki kere saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.122: Master Hit Points ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan daimi bir Fire Shield kazanir.
core.randtvrn.123: Master Hit Points ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan her tur 50 saglik puanini geri kazanir.
core.randtvrn.124: Master Damage ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan Death Stare yetenegini kazanir.
core.randtvrn.125: Master Damage ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan savasta fazla darbe verebilir.
core.randtvrn.126: Master Magic Power ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan savasta ucabilir.
core.randtvrn.127: The Sylvan Centaur is said to be half-elf and half-centaur, joined together my magic.
core.randtvrn.128: In some lands, the mountains and forests can be traversed without flying, but watch out for ambushes and landslides.
core.randtvrn.129: Some enterprising person had the bright idea to charge a toll for using the two-way monoliths but it's a mystery what he does with all the gold he collects.
core.randtvrn.13: Hidden among the desert dunes are giant Sphinxes. Answer their riddle correctly and you'll be blessed but answer wrong and you'll be cursed.
core.randtvrn.130: I've heard that an odd assortment of creatures have moved into some of the Confluxes.
core.randtvrn.131: The Sorceress can change into a raven at will, and large groups of Sorceresses often cast powerful enchantments on their foes.
core.randtvrn.132: They say that the fiery Hellsteed is related to the Nightmare; when its fires burn out it loses its soul and becomes a shadow of death.
core.randtvrn.133: Lycanthropy is spreading throughout the land. The bite of the Werewolf is far worse than its howl.
core.randtvrn.134: The Pit Kobold is an expert at underground travel.
core.randtvrn.135: The bite of the Dracolich poisons the victim's blood with evil that burns from within.
core.randtvrn.136: Some of the castles seem to be producing more gold and troops than ever before.
core.randtvrn.137: I've heard it said that some of the magic scrolls are alive and will cast spell on their own.
core.randtvrn.138: It's smart to pay attention to the relationships between the creatures in your army. Some will help each other while others will actually kill each other.
core.randtvrn.139: The writing on most signs is a lot easier to change nowadays. I suppose it must be the type of wood they're made out of.
core.randtvrn.14: The water of Valhalla's Fountain temporarily boosts the luck and skill of a hero in combat but suppresses all magical powers until the effect wears off.
core.randtvrn.140: It's amazing the new maneuvers that can be performed these days; I witnessed a legion of troops split itself into two even stacks in the heat of battle.
core.randtvrn.141: Heroes are getting pickier it seems. Many are ditching their old Commander and choosing a new one from a completely different faction than before.
core.randtvrn.142: Competition is so fierce that a lot of newly trained Commanders have picked up extra skills and abilities.
core.randtvrn.143: I heard an old wizard saying how his guild has reworked the old Protection spells so they'll protect against all kinds of spells now.
core.randtvrn.144: Apparently, many of the War Machines have been upgraded and improved so that they're a lot more useful than they used to be.
core.randtvrn.145: Sometimes heroes will promote a regular soldier from their army to Henchman status, and a Henchman who survives many battles is a force to be reckoned with.
core.randtvrn.146: I've heard rumours of Dragon Flies enchanted to drive people mad, confusing them so they can't retaliate and causing them to attack friend as often as foe.
core.randtvrn.147: There are bizarre tales of creatures who can transform themselves into any other monster you can imagine. Metamorphs, they call them.
core.randtvrn.148: These days, even the hut witches have Commanders. Your own Commander might learn a thing or two from visiting them.
core.randtvrn.149: Finding magical stones of power is a sure-fire way of boosting the abilities of your Commander.
core.randtvrn.15: In isolation, the War Zealots have mastered their fighting skills and trained their minds to repel magic.
core.randtvrn.150: Magic mirror portals situated around the land can provide a tired army with a fast way home. Just be sure you can afford to pay the mirror-keeper his fee.
core.randtvrn.151: Beware the Death Chambers in which lurk the Undead King and his evil minions! These chambers are full of treasure but only the powerful survive a visit.
core.randtvrn.152: A new type of Tactics teaches an army to maneuver faster in combat under the command of a properly trained hero.
core.randtvrn.153: There are spies infiltrating towns and performing missions of theft, sabotage and assassination. You can even hire your own spy with the right connections.
core.randtvrn.154: A lot of Scholars are researching new spells in their spare time. If there isn't a mage guild nearby, it sure would be handy to know one.
core.randtvrn.155: All good Navigators are also trained in onboard ship combat and can be a real asset during a battle.
core.randtvrn.156: If you're Lucky, some of your troops will fight better for an entire battle.
core.randtvrn.157: Heroes who make Learning a priority find that they can become better fighters or spellcaster even while studying quietly at home.
core.randtvrn.158: A Marksman's crossbow quarrel is so powerful it can often pierce a foe and damage another right behind the first.
core.randtvrn.159: Many creatures appear to have mastered new abilities lately, usually in addition to their old ones.
core.randtvrn.16: Arctic Sharpshooters are able to hide in snow-covered places, which allows them to be better protected from missile fire.
core.randtvrn.160: Neutral creatures, following no hero or flag, appear to be getting tougher and tougher as time goes on.
core.randtvrn.161: Have you heard of the Dragonmaster and how his elite Darkness Dragons now guard the old Dragon Utopias? Many foolish armies have died trying to take them on.
core.randtvrn.162: Rumour has it that powerful wizards living in emerald towers can enchant an entire species of creatures to make them more powerful.
core.randtvrn.163: When exploring certain lands you may come upon many garrisons. Be careful because they may be booby-trapped with landmines, fire walls, and other magic.
core.randtvrn.164: I've heard that sometimes heroes can use artifacts fashioned for Commanders, and the hero will gain power from the artifact instead.
core.randtvrn.165: It's said that a Pendant of Life will help living troops live longer.
core.randtvrn.166: I've heard that a Pendant of Death will make the Undead more fearsome.
core.randtvrn.167: I've heard that a Pendant of Total Recall will help archers find their mark.
core.randtvrn.168: I've heard that a Pendant of Second Sight will help you avoid a ranged attack.
core.randtvrn.169: Nothing hits the spot quite like my famous Barbecued Gorynych steaks.  No?  Well how about some Vorpal Bunny stuffed with deep fried Metamorph?
core.randtvrn.17: Lava Sharpshooters get their name from the bottles of fiery lava in which they dip their arrows. In close combat they can be used to burn their assailants.
core.randtvrn.170: I've heard that a Pendant of Holiness will bless your whole army.
core.randtvrn.171: If your soul is tainted with bloodshed you may find yourself fighting Karmic Battles against ever-increasing monstrous foes!
core.randtvrn.172: I've heard that a Pendant of Dispassion will fill your army with bloodlust.
core.randtvrn.173: I've heard that a Pendant of Free Will will make your troops' skin as hard as stone.
core.randtvrn.174: An Orb of Vulnerability will make your enemy very susceptible to disease.
core.randtvrn.175: An Orb of the Firmament will help protect your army from Lightning and other spells of the air.
core.randtvrn.176: An Orb of Silt will help protect your army from Meteor Shower and other spells of the earth.
core.randtvrn.177: An Orb of Tempestuous Fire will help protect your army from Fireball and other spells of the flame.
core.randtvrn.178: An Orb of Driving Rain will help protect your army from Ice Bolt and other watery spells.
core.randtvrn.179: Conflux Commanders are very persuasive and are often able to convince some enemy troops to never fight again.
core.randtvrn.18: Representatives of the Gods have been sent to help restore balance in Erathia.
core.randtvrn.180: Stronghold Commanders are exceptionally skilled when it comes to the Ballista.
core.randtvrn.181: Many heroes tell tales of the fabulous Adventure Caves, and the wise hermits, bountiful treasures and great danger they have found in their depths.
core.randtvrn.182: Artifacts of Conjuring will often let a hero cast additional spells in combat.
core.randtvrn.183: The magic of a Sphere of Permanence makes non-living troops tougher.
core.randtvrn.184: A Necromancer's Skeletons are always warriors if she wears a pair of Deadman's Boots.
core.randtvrn.185: A Necromancer's Vampires are always Lords if he wears the Vampire's Cowl.
core.randtvrn.186: A Necromancer's Walking Dead always become Zombies if she wears the Undertaker's Amulet.
core.randtvrn.187: A Hero's Centaurs are always Captains if he wields the Centaur's Axe.
core.randtvrn.188: A Hero's Dwarves are always Battle-hardened if he wears the Shield of the Dwarven Lords.
core.randtvrn.189: A Hero's Dendroids are always Soldiers if she wears a Breastplate of Petrified Wood.
core.randtvrn.19: An Emissary of War will grant an increase to a Hero's attack skill every week.
core.randtvrn.190: A Hero's Unicorns are always trained for War if he wears a Helm of the Alabaster Unicorn.
core.randtvrn.191: The mysterious Garb of the Forest Lord is formed from the Centaur's Axe, the Shield of the Dwarven Lords, and the Breastplate of Petrified Wood.
core.randtvrn.192: If you wear a Statesman's Medal, Diplomat's Ring or Ambassador's Sash, the creatures you meet will sometimes be a little friendlier than usual.
core.randtvrn.193: The Vestment's of Authority, formed by wearing a Statesman's Medal, Diplomat's Ring and Ambassador's Sash will persuade many to join you.
core.randtvrn.194: Beware the Santa Gremlins! They may look cute but they hurl magical daggers of ice in combat.
core.randtvrn.195: Royal Griffins will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Bird of Perception.
core.randtvrn.196: Sprites will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Pendant of Life.
core.randtvrn.197: Zombies will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Pendant of Death.
core.randtvrn.198: Beware the Rampaging Ogre for he'll stop at nothing to get back his shield!
core.randtvrn.199: I've heard that a certain pair of boots is haunted by a ghost of a dead cobbler. Every week he'll make a new pair, completely identical to the first.
core.randtvrn.2: In an Arcane Tower lives a ghost who can help you realize your combat or magical potential. But, there's a price; with every gain comes a corresponding loss.
core.randtvrn.20: An Emissary of Peace will grant an increase to a Hero's defense skill every week.
core.randtvrn.200: It is said that if we remembered everything we experienced we would be very wise indeed. And that's just what the Pendant of Total Recall lets you do.
core.randtvrn.201: If you want to recover gold pilfered by your troops, be sure to get yourself an Emblem of Cognizance.
core.randtvrn.202: When traveling in parts unknown, bring along a Stoic Watchman. This little artifact lets you see for miles! Pity it takes 7 days to recharge.
core.randtvrn.203: Many novice troops who attack at range will benefit from the power of a Pendant of Second Sight.
core.randtvrn.204: A Pendant of Holiness bestows the knowledge of holy spells upon its wearer.
core.randtvrn.205: If you absolutely must get some place fast, invest in a pair of Boots of Polarity. They're only good for one trip but sometimes that's all you need.
core.randtvrn.206: A wizard is gathering up all Garnitures of Interference to destroy them because they're messing up his magic, but he'll give you a fair trade for one.
core.randtvrn.207: The secret to increased knowledge is the attainment of a calm and dispassionate mind. A Pendant of Dispassion is a great help with this task.
core.randtvrn.208: It is said that a Pendant of Free Will can improve those creatures who have little or no will themselves.
core.randtvrn.209: Diplomacy is an essential part of war and a strong army is sure to result from the use of the Diplomat's Ring.
core.randtvrn.21: An Emissary of Mana will grant an increase to a Hero's power skill every week.
core.randtvrn.210: An Orb of Vulnerability not only makes creatures susceptible to magic but attracts mages who wish to study this phenomenon.
core.randtvrn.211: Nobody knows why, but Mighty Gorgons seem attracted to the wielder of a Sphere of Permanence and will serve that wielder loyally.
core.randtvrn.212: A Statesman's Medal brings prestige to any town. A Hero who donates one is certain to have a building constructed in his honour.
core.randtvrn.213: If you release the djinn trapped within an Orb of Inhibition, he'll grant a boon to some of your troops.
core.randtvrn.214: The Surcoat of Counterpoise appears to have a beneficial affect when worn with certain artifacts.
core.randtvrn.215: A Castle's Arrow Towers improve with each battle won.
core.randtvrn.216: There are many exciting ways to use shimmering bars of magical Mithril!
core.randtvrn.217: Magical Mithril is rare. You can't trade for it, but sometimes you'll find it lying around in stacks.
core.randtvrn.218: I heard of a man who was quietly fishing at a well when horrible monsters crawled out and ate him!
core.randtvrn.219: A Hero skilled in the art of Sorcery can sometimes visit certain places from afar.
core.randtvrn.22: An Emissary of Lore will grant an increase to a Hero's knowledge skill every week.
core.randtvrn.220: For those skilled in Mysticism, some things that were hidden are now revealed.
core.randtvrn.221: For those skilled in Sorcery, much that was unknown is now revealed.
core.randtvrn.222: There's a vast underground tunnel complex connected by Magic Wells but sometimes it's hard to locate the entrance.
core.randtvrn.223: Many Rogues make their home in the mysterious Adventure Caves and sometimes they can be bargained with.
core.randtvrn.224: Buyulu oklar tarafindan korunan sandiklara dikkat et!
core.randtvrn.225: Zehirli gazlar tarafindan korunan sandiklara dikkat et!
core.randtvrn.226: At the Palace of Dreams, a fool and his gold are soon parted.
core.randtvrn.227: The water of Valhalla's Fountain temporarily boosts the luck and skill of a hero in combat but suppresses all magical powers until the effect wears off.
core.randtvrn.228: Drinking the waters of Hydromel from a Fountain of Fortune will temporarily boost a hero's attack and defense skills in combat.
core.randtvrn.229: Breathing the spores of giant mushrooms of air, fire, earth and water will temporarily give a hero great power over the magic spells of those elements.
core.randtvrn.23: Monsters around these parts are crazy! Have you heard the nonsense they mutter about?
core.randtvrn.230: Sometimes you'll find the deed to a fully-functional mine locked away in a chest. They're completely legal.
core.randtvrn.231: Asmodeus is attuned to Hero's who carry the Hourglass of the Evil Hour and will fight for any who call him. But a piece of the Hero's soul is the price.
core.randtvrn.232: The Inferno and Fortress have trained for a long time and are now closer in ability to the other factions.
core.randtvrn.233: Sometimes a wizard will lose her spellbook and the lucky finder will gain its power instead.
core.randtvrn.234: The strange inhabitants of the Grotto keep a stash of ore and gold.
core.randtvrn.235: Destroy some lowly vampires at the Transylvanian Tavern and you may impress the Vampire Lords enough to join your cause.
core.randtvrn.236: Yarasa Evi Vampirler icin bir cennettir.
core.randtvrn.237: The woodland protectors of the Hunting Lodge stockpile wood and gold.
core.randtvrn.238: Dispose of the guardian Golems and Gremlins of the Snow-covered Grotto and claim your reward.
core.randtvrn.239: A Hero can leave his troops just about anywhere on guard duty but if they feel abandoned, they'll never rejoin his army.
core.randtvrn.24: If you destroy a town, you must wait awhile for the dust to settle before rebuilding.
core.randtvrn.240: Master Attack ve Master Defense ozelligi olan bir komutan rakibinin savunmasini 50% azaltabilir.
core.randtvrn.241: Master Attack ve Master Hit Points ozelligi olan bir komutan rakiplerini korkudan dondurabilir.
core.randtvrn.242: Master Attack ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan her zaman max hasar verir.
core.randtvrn.243: Master Attack ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutana karsilik verilemez.
core.randtvrn.244: Master Attack ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan uzaktan saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.245: Master Defense ve Master Hit Points ozelligi olan bir komutan can retaliate against unlimited foes.
core.randtvrn.246: Master Defense ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan cevresindeki butun dusmanlara birden saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.247: Master Defense ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan rakiplerini felc edebilir.
core.randtvrn.248: Master Defense ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan ara sira fiziksel saldirilari bloke edebilir.
core.randtvrn.249: Master Hit Points ve Master Damage ozelligi olan bir komutan her tur iki kere saldirabilir.
core.randtvrn.25: The fabled Golden Arrow relic will protect an army from a castle's arrow tower defenses.
core.randtvrn.250: Master Hit Points ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan daimi bir Fire Shield kazanir.
core.randtvrn.251: Master Hit Points ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan her tur 50 saglik puanini geri kazanir.
core.randtvrn.252: Master Damage ve Master Magic Power ozelligi olan bir komutan Death Stare yetenegini kazanir.
core.randtvrn.253: Master Damage ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan savasta fazla darbe verebilir.
core.randtvrn.254: Master Magic Power ve Master Speed ozelligi olan bir komutan savasta ucabilir.
core.randtvrn.26: Arrow Towers shoot faster when the fabled Golden Arrow relic is in the hands of a Hero defending a castle against siege.
core.randtvrn.27: A Supreme Archangel's attack is simply devastating. Nothing can stand against it!
core.randtvrn.28: I've heard that Ghost Behemoths can walk straight through a castle wall as if it weren't there!
core.randtvrn.29: I've heard that a Lord of Thunder tosses thunderbolts twice as fast as any Titan.
core.randtvrn.3: The vampiric Blood Dragon will drain a victim's life to replenish its own.
core.randtvrn.30: I've heard that Hell Hydras regenerate their lost heads.
core.randtvrn.31: Ancient Tomes of Knowledge will help you master a skill. These scholarly volumes can sometimes be found locked away in chests.
core.randtvrn.32: If your mind is cluttered with useless knowledge, visiting the monks at the Market of Time will help you free it to learn new things.
core.randtvrn.33: Whether you seek powerful artifacts or valuable commodities, a visit to the Palace of Dreams is the place to go to win!
core.randtvrn.34: I heard of a hero who went fishing in a Magic Well. He hauled up a chest full of riches!
core.randtvrn.35: If you're feeling lucky, pull up a chair at the tavern down the road and join in a game of cards. You could double or even triple your stake!
core.randtvrn.36: Groups of freelance creatures can be hired at the Freelancer's Guild for a very reasonable price. They'll work alone but won't betray you.
core.randtvrn.37: I heard of a man who came upon a giant living skull. It spoke to him, and for a small fee it told him where he could find a powerful artifact!
core.randtvrn.38: Altars of Transformation are mysterious and very old. Nobody knows who built these arcane structures, but their power can transform an entire army.
core.randtvrn.39: The mystical Summoning Stones are used by heroes to fortify their armies with reinforcements when they're far from home.
core.randtvrn.4: In the dead of night, the fearsome Darkness Dragon swoops down upon its prey, searing it with black flame and then flies away again in the blink of an eye.
core.randtvrn.40: Those who drink the water from the fountain of Venus receive her blessing. In combat it bolsters their morale and boosts their luck.
core.randtvrn.41: Nothing hits the spot quite like my famous Barbecued Werewolf Steaks.  No?  Well how about some Wild Boar stuffed with chopped Goblin Rider?
core.randtvrn.42: Heroes with Eagle Eye always seem to know more spells than they could have learned in battle.
core.randtvrn.43: A good Commander is an asset to any Hero.
core.randtvrn.44: Dungeon Commanders sell the dead bodies of their enemies for gold.
core.randtvrn.45: A Rampart Commander will make sure your First Aid Tent is better than new.
core.randtvrn.46: Inferno Commanders can charm troops from an enemy army to their side before the battle begins.
core.randtvrn.47: Fortress Commanders have excellent attack and defense in combat.
core.randtvrn.48: Tower Commanders have learned how to replenish their Hero's mana during combat.
core.randtvrn.49: Castle Commanders learn quicker than all others.
core.randtvrn.5: The Cover of Darkness can be used to elude your enemies as can the Hero Nagash and the Darkness Dragon.
core.randtvrn.50: Necropolis Commanders are as dead as the armies they command but can reanimate their fallen comrades.
core.randtvrn.51: When you take the cards of prophecy into battle they may give you luck or give you misfortune. Usually it's luck though which is a pretty good deal.
core.randtvrn.52: Rogues will often seek out and join a Hero who is proficient in the ways of Scouting.
core.randtvrn.53: Many heroes tell tales of the fabulous Adventure Caves, and the wise hermits, bountiful treasures and great danger they have found in their depths.
core.randtvrn.54: If you're lacking basic training or badly in need of gold or resources, visit the kindly folks at an Alms House for some help.
core.randtvrn.55: An eccentric old guy runs a Junk Merchant's shop and will buy your more useless artifacts from you. He'll generally give you a pretty good deal.
core.randtvrn.56: If you need some money to develop a town or finance that new army, stop by the Bank. They're always willing to give a loan to new customers with good credit.
core.randtvrn.57: Sometimes, if you're lucky, you can find a Mysterious Creature Dwelling where a ready-made army can be yours if can afford them.
core.randtvrn.58: Ever wish your magic shield was more magic or your magic sword had more slaying power? Visit a friendly Artificer; for a small fee he'll upgrade your artifacts.
core.randtvrn.59: If you're in need of combat training or perhaps a good sword or shield, visit the Battle Academy and sign up for classes.
core.randtvrn.6: The flames of the Sacred Phoenix will burn any who engage it in combat.
core.randtvrn.60: Need to bone up on some magic skills? Visit the School of Wizardry and sign up for lessons today!
core.randtvrn.61: Heroes who excel at Learning may find their combat and magic skills advancing even faster than they expect.
core.randtvrn.62: Bizarre as it may sound, Heroes who study the art of magic Resistance, will sometimes "resist" the advanced training of enemy troops.
core.randtvrn.63: A Hero skilled in Artillery may be able to pick off a few enemies before the armies even engage in battle.
core.randtvrn.64: A Hero proficient in First Aid can sometimes bring mortally wounded creatures back to life after a battle.
core.randtvrn.65: Santa Gremlins are always surrounded by their loyal bodyguards.
core.randtvrn.66: Beware the Santa Gremlins! They may look cute but they hurl magical daggers of ice in combat.
core.randtvrn.67: Royal Griffins will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Bird of Perception.
core.randtvrn.68: Sprites will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Pendant of Life.
core.randtvrn.69: Zombies will seek out and serve any Hero who carries a Pendant of Death.
core.randtvrn.7: When a town has been completely destroyed, only the Ghosts remain.
core.randtvrn.70: Beware the Rampaging Ogre for he'll stop at nothing to get back his shield!
core.randtvrn.71: I've heard that a certain pair of boots is haunted by a ghost of a dead cobbler. Every week he'll make a new pair, completely identical to the first.
core.randtvrn.72: It is said that if we remembered everything we experienced we would be very wise indeed. And that's just what the Pendant of Total Recall lets you do.
core.randtvrn.73: If you want to recover gold pilfered by your troops, be sure to get yourself an Emblem of Cognizance.
core.randtvrn.74: When traveling in parts unknown, bring along a Stoic Watchman. This little artifact lets you see for miles! Pity it takes 7 days to recharge.
core.randtvrn.75: Many novice troops who attack at range will benefit from the power of a Pendant of Second Sight.
core.randtvrn.76: A Pendant of Holiness bestows the knowledge of holy spells upon its wearer.
core.randtvrn.77: If you absolutely must get some place fast, invest in a pair of Boots of Polarity. They're only good for one trip but sometimes that's all you need.
core.randtvrn.78: A wizard is gathering up all Garnitures of Interference to destroy them because they're messing up his magic, but he'll give you a fair trade for one.
core.randtvrn.79: The secret to increased knowledge is the attainment of a calm and dispassionate mind. A Pendant of Dispassion is a great help with this task.
core.randtvrn.8: Ghosts will increase their number from the souls of those they kill.
core.randtvrn.80: It is said that a Pendant of Free Will can improve those creatures who have little or no will themselves.
core.randtvrn.81: A magic spell scroll once saved my life when it cast its spell all on its own. It almost seemed to be alive!
core.randtvrn.82: An Orb of Vulnerability not only makes creatures susceptible to magic but attracts mages who wish to study this phenomenon.
core.randtvrn.83: Nobody knows why, but Mighty Gorgons seem attracted to the wielder of a Sphere of Permanence and will serve that wielder loyally.
core.randtvrn.84: A Statesman's Medal brings prestige to any town. A Hero who donates one is certain to have a building constructed in his honour.
core.randtvrn.85: If you release the djinn trapped within an Orb of Inhibition, he'll grant a boon to some of your troops.
core.randtvrn.86: The Surcoat of Counterpoise appears to have a beneficial affect when worn with certain artifacts.
core.randtvrn.87: A Castle's Arrow Towers improve with each battle won.
core.randtvrn.88: There are many exciting ways to use shimmering bars of magical Mithril!
core.randtvrn.89: Magical Mithril is rare. You can't trade for it, but sometimes you'll find it lying around in stacks.
core.randtvrn.9: Elemental Messengers of Fire, Air, Earth and Water are tough to kill and highly resistant to magic of their own element.
core.randtvrn.90: I heard of a man who was quietly fishing at a well when horrible monsters crawled out and ate him!
core.randtvrn.91: A Hero skilled in the art of Sorcery can sometimes visit certain places from afar.
core.randtvrn.92: For those skilled in Mysticism, some things that were hidden are now revealed.
core.randtvrn.93: For those skilled in Sorcery, much that was unknown is now revealed.
core.randtvrn.94: There's a vast underground tunnel complex connected by Magic Wells but sometimes it's hard to locate the entrance.
core.randtvrn.95: Many Rogues make their home in the mysterious Adventure Caves and sometimes they can be bargained with.
core.randtvrn.96: Buyulu oklar tarafindan korunan sandiklara dikkat et!
core.randtvrn.97: Zehirli gazlar tarafindan korunan sandiklara dikkat et!
core.randtvrn.98: At the Palace of Dreams, a fool and his gold are soon parted.
core.randtvrn.99: The water of Valhalla's Fountain temporarily boosts the luck and skill of a hero in combat but suppresses all magical powers until the effect wears off.
core.seerhut.empty.1: This should be the home of %s the Seer, but it appears to have been abandoned for quite some time.
core.seerhut.empty.2: The locals said this was the home of %s, but there is clearly no one here.
core.seerhut.empty.3: You're convinced this was the home of %s, but it is clear it has been deserted for some time.
core.seerhut.empty.4: Time has run out.  You will never pass here.
core.seerhut.empty.5: Time has run out.  You will never pass here.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.0: Ah, exactly what I needed!  Here is the reward I promised.  You still wish to trade the %s, yes?
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.1: Yes!  This %s is perfect!  Now if you'll kindly give it to me, I shall pay what I promised.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.2: Yes, this might just be what we're looking for!  May I please have the %s?
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.3: The wizard agrees to let you by in exchange for the %s.  Do wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.4: Using the %s you may open the gate and pass through.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.complete.5: "Give it here and you can pass.  Want a dog?  Just kidding, will you give %s to me?"
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.0: Long ago, powerful wizards were able to create magical artifacts, but time has caused us to forget how to make new items.  I would like to learn these techniques myself, but I need one of these artifacts first to see how it was done.  If you could bring me, the %s, you would be well rewarded.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.1: I've spent my life buying, selling, and collecting artifacts, but lately I've been spending so much money acquiring new pieces I can hardly turn a profit.  I think I might be able to start mass-producing artifacts, but I've got to have one first to copy.  If you could bring me the %s, I will reward your efforts.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.2: In my younger days I'd have done this myself, but I need your help.  A friend of mine recently had a family heirloom stolen, and wants to find it.  The problem is that it looks exactly like the %s.  Please bring me any item that fits that description.  Even if the artifact is not the family heirloom, I will reward your efforts.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.3: A powerful wizard owns this tower.  He refuses to let you pass unless you bring him the %s.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.4: This gate can only be opened with a very special key.  Bring back the %s and you will be able to pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.receive.5: A small, henpecked man preers over the gate.  "No one may pass.  My dog ate my wife's %s and I'm not leaving here until I find a replacement."
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.0: Nothing, eh?  I'm sure you will find the %s soon.  Please keep looking.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.1: You still haven't found the %s?  Well please keep looking, I lose money with each passing day!
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.2: Nothing yet?  Ah well, keep trying, I'm sure the %s is out there somewhere.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.3: The wizard is admant.  Without the %s, none will pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.4: You have not yet found the key, without the %s you cannot pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringArt.visit.5: Sorry, that won't fool her.  You need the %s in order to get me to leave.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.complet: At last, the %s that will save our empire!  Here is your payment. Are they ready to depart?
Excellent!  You have brought us the right amount of %s as guards.  Will you exchange them for a great reward?
Thank you so much kind travelor!  I will give you a bountiful reward in exchange for the service of those %s.
Excellent!  You have found the %s the King is so anxious to see.  Let them go with us and you may pass.
Excellent!  You may pass if you give us the %s.  Will you make the exchange now?
The mercenaries agree to let you pass in exchange for %s as recruits.  Do you wish to make the exchange now?
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.receive: I am an agent for an emperor of a distant land.  Recently, his armies have fallen on hard times.  If you could bring %s to me, I could pay you handsomely.
In order to travel through these dangerous lands my envoy needs more backup.  I hear %s are excellent guards.  If you were to bring them to me I would be deeply grateful
It is traditional for a groom to have an escort of %s in order to go to his bride.  We were attacked and most of my escort was killed.  If you could persuade them to help me I would be very grateful.
The King wants to see some %s.  In order for him to do so we need to look outside the kingdom.  Bring us them and we'll let you through.
Each year during our Festival of Life we need some %s.  Bring some or don't bother coming back.  It is the only way you will pass.
A mercenary troop occupies this tower.  They say they will let you pass if you bring them %s as recruits.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.0: No luck in finding the %s?  Please hurry, the empire depends on you.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.1: I am sorry, but we really want %s as guards.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.2: No, those will simply not do.  You must bring me %s before I can go to my bride to be.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.3: I am sorry, but the King wants to only see %s, nothing else will do.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.4: Nothing but %s will do for our Festival.  Begone until you have them.
core.seerhut.quest.bringCreature.visit.5: The mercenaries still require %s before you may pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.0: Finally!  It is you, %s.  Here is what I have for you.  Do you accept?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.1: Finally!  It is you, %s.  Here is what I have for you.  Do you accept?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.2: Finally!  It is you, %s.  Here is what I have for you.  Do you accept?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.3: At last, it is %s.  Do you wish to pass?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.4: At last, it is %s.  Do you wish to pass?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.complete.5: At last, it is %s.  Do you wish to pass?
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.0: What I have is for %s alone.  I shall give it to none other.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.1: What I have is for %s alone.  I shall give it to none other.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.2: What I have is for %s alone.  I shall give it to none other.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.3: The guards here say they have orders to only let %s pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.4: The guards here say they have orders to only let %s pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.receive.5: The guards here say they have orders to only let %s pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.visit.3: The guards here will only let %s pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.visit.4: The guards here will only let %s pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringHero.visit.5: The guards here will only let %s pass.
Ah, %s bayragi tasiyan kisi.  Sana bir hediyem var.  Kabul eder misin?
Ah, %s bayragi tasiyan kisi.  Sana bir hediyem var.  Kabul eder misin?
Ah, %s bayragi tasiyan kisi.  Sana bir hediyem var.  Kabul eder misin?
Gardiyanlar %s bayragini farkettiler ve gecmeni nerdiler. Kabul ediyor musun?
Gardiyanlar %s bayragini farkettiler ve gecmeni nerdiler. Kabul ediyor musun?
Gardiyanlar %s bayragini farkettiler ve gecmeni nerdiler. Kabul ediyor musun?
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.0: I have a prize for those who fly the %s flag.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.1: I have a prize for those who fly the %s flag.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.2: I have a prize for those who fly the %s flag.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.3: The guards here say they will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.4: The guards here say they will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.receive.5: The guards here say they will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.0: Bayragin %s degil.  Senin icin hic bir seyim yok.  Kaybol!
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.1: Bayragin %s degil.  Senin icin hic bir seyim yok.  Kaybol!
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.2: Bayragin %s degil.  Senin icin hic bir seyim yok.  Kaybol!
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.3: The guards here will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.4: The guards here will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringPlayer.visit.5: The guards here will only let those who fly the %s flag pass.
core.seerhut.quest.bringResources.comple: Finally!  Here, give the %s to me, and I'll give you this in return.
Ahh, with all of the %s we can build good homes for them.  Would you accept this in return for your donation?
Thank you so much kind travelor!  If you give me %s I will give you a reward.  Will you trade?
The guards here are charging a toll of all travelers.  They will let you pass for %s.  Do you wish to pay the toll?
If you give us the King's Road Tax of %s we will let you pass.  Do you agree?
Now that is the right kind of money.  With %s we can build or buy ourselves a nice place.  You give it here and we let you pass, eh?
core.seerhut.quest.bringResources.receiv: I am researching a way to turn base metals into gold, but I am short of materials for my workshop.  If you could bring me %s, I would be most grateful.
Please help the poor children of the area.  If you could bring %s we could pay to have homes built for them.  I would be at your service.
Please help me!  I was robbed on the way to my wedding, and without a dowry my future husband will not be able to accept me.  If you could bring me %s I would reward you.
The guards here are charging a toll of all travelers.  They will let you pass for %s.
All people must pay the King's Road Tax.  It is %s.  Unless you pay it we will not let you pay.
We are quite sorry, but we refuse to move out of here and let you through.  If you were to bring us %s then we could move into another, comfortable home.
Oh my, that's simply not enough.  I need %s.  I'll never complete it with what you have.
Not unless all of %s is donated we cannot build adequate homes for the orphans.
My dowry must contain all of %s or I cannot get married.
Since you have not brought %s, the guards forbid you passage.
That is not enough.  The King's Road Tax is %s.
For that pathetic amount we couldn't buy a shack.  We'll need at least %s in order to have a good home.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.0: I thought you had promise.  You have indeed reached level %d. Come in, come in.  Here, I have something to reward you for your efforts.  Do you accept?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.1: Ahhh, you have reached level %d.  Would you like to receive a reward?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.2: Finally, there is someone to whom I can bequeath my worldly possessions, now that you have achieved level %d do you wish to inherit?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.3: The guards acknowledge that you have indeed reached level %d.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.4: Now that you have reached %d level you may join our guild.  Membership is free.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.complete.5: Excellent!  Now that you are %d level our King will not have any problems with you.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.0: I am old and wise, and I do not admit just anyone into my home.  You may enter when you have reached experience level %d.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.1: The reward I have is only for someone who is wise enough to handle it.  Achieve experience level %d and I will reward you.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.2: I am old, and dying.  Before I die I want to bequeath my possessions to someone worthy of them.  Achieve level %d and I will know of your worth.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.3: The lands beyond are very dangerous.  The guards eye you dubiously, but agree to let you by when you have achieved the experience level %d.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.4: I am sorry, but this is a guildhouse, and only those who are experienced enough can join.  Only those who are part of the guildhouse may pass.  Until you reach level %d, you may not join.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.receive.5: We have a problem with our King.  He doesn't like to be surrounded by immature people.  Therefore you need to be of %d level in order to pass through.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.0: Faugh.  You again.  Come back when you are level %d, as I told you.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.1: Not even close to level %d, leave me until you are there!
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.2: You are unworthy.  Only someone who is level %d will be worthy enough.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.3: The guards here simply will not permit anyone below level %d to pass.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.4: There is no way we're going to let a wimp like you into our guild.  Not until you are %d level can you join.
core.seerhut.quest.heroLevel.visit.5: Only when you are level %d will our King stand for your presence.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.complete: At last, you defeated the %s, and the countryside is safe again!  Are you ready to accept the reward?
The %s are gone from our home and we can return!  Will you accept this reward?
The route is clear, I thank you deeply.  Take this as a symbol of my gratitude.
News of your defeat of the %s of the %s region traveled quickly.  Do you wish to pass, oh newly Belted Knight?
Now that the %s are gone we can open our doors.  Would you like to enter at this time?
Your loyalty has been proven by defeating the %s.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
%s are menacing the %s region of this land.  If you could be so bold as to defeat them, I would reward you richly.
A group of %s have driven us from our homes.  If you could drive them off we could go home, and would leave you with great rewards.
In order to get to my sick mother I have to get by the %s first.  I am not a great warrior, but could reward you if the path was cleared.
The Belted Knights of Erathia guard this tower.  They will only let one of their own pass.  To join the order, you must first defeat the %s of the %s region.
%s are running loose out there.  We can't open the doors until each and every one is driven from the land.
Our doors do not open for anyone.  Prove your loyalty by defeating our enemies, the %s.  Only then will you be allowed to pass.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.visit.0: Don't lose heart.  Defeating the %s is a difficult task, but you will surely succeed.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.visit.1: The %s have not been driven off.  Until then we cannot go home.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.visit.2: My route is still infested with %s.  Please hurry, mother becomes more ill each day.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.visit.3: The Belted Knights still will not let you pass, so you have not conquered the %s of the %s region.
core.seerhut.quest.killCreature.visit.5: You have not yet proved your loyalty by defeating the %s.  Leave us.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.0: I thought the day would never come!  %s is no more.  Please, will you accept this reward?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.1: Now I may continue with my sad life, that %s has been brought to justice.  For this comfort would you accept a reward?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.2: We are finally able to return to our home, no that %s has been defeated.  Would you accept a reward as a token of our gratitude?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.3: Now that you have vanquished %s, the threat is gone.  Do you wish to pass?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.4: Since %s has been defeated and is no longer a threat the guards may let people pass.  Do you wish to pass at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.complete.5: You have taught %s a lesson so the Queen will allow people to pass.  Do you wish to at this time?
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.0: I was once rich and famous, but %s the terrible was my downfall.  I lost my lands, I lost my title, and I lost my family.  Please, bring the villain to justice.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.1: Long ago I was in love, but %s killed my sweetheart.  Please, destroy this evil villian so I may live the rest of my life knowing my love's killer has been brought to justice.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.2: We were driven from our home by %s.  If you could make sure they will never bother us again we would reward you greatly.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.3: The guards here protect the lands beyond from the depredations of %s.  They will not let anyone pass so long as the threat remains.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.4: The guards were placed here in order to keep out %s, a hero of great power and evil intentions towards their people.  Until they are defeated no one shall pass.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.receive.5: The Queen wants %s to be taught a lesson because they insulted her, calling her a fat old hag.  Until this is done she has closed the borders.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.0: Oh, I wish you brought better news.  It aches my heart that %s still roams free.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.1: Still, the murder of my love, %s is left to freely wander the world.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.2: %s is still out there and can harm us.  Not until they are gone will we leave.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.3: The guards still fear %s, so you cannot pass.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.4: %s is still running around on the loose.
core.seerhut.quest.killHero.visit.5: %s has still not yet been taught a lesson.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.complete: I've always wanted to meet someone as famous as you.  Will you let me write down your life story?
You have reached %s, as I knew you would.  Are you ready to see the great rewards as a result?
It is a great thing to meet someone better than I.  You have achieved %s, will you accept the rewards of doing so?
The retired heroes set you a series of tests, which you pass easily, demonstrating your mastery of %s.  Do you wish to pass?
You have reached %s.  Do you wish to pass?
She is very impressed by you because you have reached %s.  Do you wish to pass now?
I am a biographer of great heroes.  I'd really like to meet a hero who has mastered %s.  I'd pay well for his story.
For those who have attained %s there are great rewards.  When you are finished return to me and I will see what can be done.
I am not likely to speak with anyone who is lesser than myself.  If you have %s then you will be better than I, and worthy of my attentions
The guard post here is manned by retired heroes.  They will not let you pass until you can prove you have mastered %s.
Only those who have reached %s are allowed to pass.  Our reasons are our own.
A fair maiden languishes within the tower and only allows those who impress her to pass through.  You would need a %s in order to impress her.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.0: Have you found a great hero for me to interview?  He must have reached %s.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.1: I am truly sorry, but you have not attained %s and I will not help you until then.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.2: You are still unworthy.  Only someone with %s will be better than I.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.3: The retired heroes set you a series of tests, which you fail miserably.  Clearly you have not mastered %s.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.4: You have not reached %s, go away.
core.seerhut.quest.primarySkill.visit.5: She laughs because you have not yet reached %s, and are not impressive.
core.tcommand.30: Portalden yaratik cagirmak icin disaridan yaratik habitati ele gecirilmeli.
core.tvrninfo.2: Bu sehirde zaten bir kahraman var.
core.vcdesc.9: Btn yaratik retim merkezlerini ele geir
faction.core.castle.name: Castle
faction.core.conflux.name: Conflux
faction.core.dungeon.name: Dungeon
